casebody.data:
Michael Glynn CARROLL, Appellee, v. AMERICAN AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant. No. 356. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 29, 1939. Fenton, Wing & Morse, R. Clarke Smith, and Leonard F. Wing, all of Rut-land, Vt., for appellant. Lawrence & O’Brien and Edwin W. Lawrence, all of Rutland, Vt., for appel-lee.

Before L. HAND, CHASE, and PATTERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
